Control Name: Removes Physical Access—Processes are in place to remove access to physical resources when an individual no longer requires access.

control_attributes.Control: Removes Physical Access—Processes are in place to remove access to physical resources when an individual no longer requires access.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.4 The entity restricts physical access to facilities and protected information assets (for example, data center facilities, back-up media storage, and other sensitive locations) to authorized personnel to meet the entity’s objectives.
